issue.title: [Ruby] Add ability to pass Arrow::Column to Arrow::Function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14551](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14551). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Instead of 
```java

add = Arrow::Function.find('add')
add.execute([table['age'].data, table['age'].data]).value
```
we can pass column directly
```java

add.execute([table['age'], table['age']]).value
```
